name: Number Line Link - Draw Puzzle
description:
Number Line Link
If you enjoy puzzles you’re going to love Number Line Link! It’s is a very creative and addictive puzzle game. Get ready to spend endless hours of enjoyment along your tablet or phone with this fun and simple puzzle game.
Link numbers and make sure the sum of each line corresponds to the prompt number displayed on the upper left screen. Link all numbers and cover the entire board to pass the level. Please note that if the lines intersect or overlap, the previous lines will disappear!
The game has three modes: simple, medium and hard. How you play depends on you. So, try Number Line Link and gain new experiences!
